column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hiroshi Sato says : " I 've dreamed of this day for so long . "
#Text=Amon says : " Yes , the time has come for the Equalists to claim Republic City as their own . "
#Text=Asami says : " Where did you say you parked the car ? "
#Text=Korra says : " It 's right around here somewhere .
#Text=" Korra says : " Hey , you guys got arrested and left me alone with the car !
#Text=I made it very clear I do n't know how to drive .
#Text=" Bolin says : " All things considered you did a great job !
#Text=But how are we going to pay for all these parking tickets ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Relax , the city is under attack .
#Text=The police have more important things to worry about .
#Text=" Asami says : " This 'll come in handy .
#Text=Why do n't you sit in back ?
#Text=With Korra .
#Text=" Mako says : " I think I will .
#Text=" Korra says : " Everything all right ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , everything is terrific ... " Bolin says : " Car !
#Text=Oh , we 're good .
#Text="
